author: Ubisoft
description:
Surprise! Know everything about The Rogue Prince of Persia, out now on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC.
Coming later this year to Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2!

It’s time to rewrite fate, save Persia… or die trying.
Play now the 1.0 👉 https://store.ubisoft.com/6635164075637a09298a6001.html

Huge thanks to everyone who joined us during Early Access and helped shape the game! ⚔️ 

 INSTAGRAM: princeofpersia_game
 FACEBOOK: Prince Of Persia
X: @princeofpersia
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/PrinceofPersia

The Rogue Prince of Persia is a challenging, fast-paced roguelite, where every death is a unique chance to rewrite fate, save Persia – or die trying. Explore and platform in a shifting kingdom imagined by Evil Empire, master an acrobatic combat style, and meet new allies as you fight to rewrite the fate of your people. 

Available now on:
 Ubisoft Store ➡️ https://store.ubisoft.com/6635164075637a09298a6001.html
Game Pass & Xbox Series X/S ➡️ https://
title: Deep Dive Trailer - The Rogue Prince of Persia

author: Ubisoft

About The Rogue Prince of Persia:
The Rogue Prince of Persia is a challenging, fast-paced roguelite, where every death is a unique chance to rewrite fate, save Persia – or die trying. Explore and platform in a shifting kingdom imagined by Evil Empire, master an acrobatic combat style, and meet new allies as you fight to rewrite the fate of your people. 

Available now on:
 Ubisoft Store ➡️ https://store.ubisoft.com/6635164075637a09298a6001.html
